title: Can you list 12 songs for an album of The Doors' darkest songs, and what would you name this collection? - Quora

response.answer_text: As the self proclaimed biggest fan of The Doors, I apologize and respect you but want to declare this question invalid. You cannot gain any knowledge or information from this question because people have different life experiences and what is dark to one individual is largely based upon what traumas or issues you have or have previously had. Initially, I took this question seriously and started to think about what songs always make me cry. I had to stop. The exercise brought me to dark places as that was the point, and just no. The Doors are the greatest band ever! Don't make it sad! 😍🤩✌

In absolutely no particular order (and going by lyrical content/subject matter, not musical tone/atmosphere): The End, Peace Frog, The Unknown Soldier, Strange Days, People are Strange, When the Music's Over, Horse Latitudes, Moonlight Drive, Celebration of the Lizard, The W.A.S.P. (Texas Radio & the Big Beat), Soul Kitchen, The Soft Parade. As for a title…i think the other side would be appropriate

The collection name? “Only The Beginning of The End.” If I did, I seriously do not mean to step on other peoples’ toes. Tracks, go in order as listed. side 1 People Are Strange Strange Days The Soft Parade Five To One Waiting For The Sun Soul Kitchen Riders On The Storm side 2 The End Strange Days Love Street When The Music’s Over

Can you list 12 songs for an album of The Doors' darkest songs, and what would you name this collection? STRANGE SOUL Riders Of The Storm I Can’t See Your Face In My Mind Your Lost Little Girl Break On Through Strange Days People Are Strange Ghost Song Soul Kitchen Light My Fire Don’t you Love Her Madly When the Music Is Over The End

TURN OUT THE LIGHTS Side One People Are Strange Cars Hiss by my Window Riders on the Storm Five to One Horse Latitudes When the Music's Over Side Two Been Down So Long Yes, the River Knows The WASP (Texas Radio and the Big Beat) Crawling King Snake Celebration of the Lizard The End

Considering that The Doors recorded 50 or so songs in the studio, 12 “darkest songs” is a tall order. The End would certainly make the list, but I don’t find their work all that dark. Hyacinth House? Celebration of the Lizard?

Subversive songs for philosophy side one Peace Frog Unknown Soldier Break on Thru Riders on the Storm The End Soft Parade Moonlight Drive When the Musics Over Night of Stone side two songs for making out End of the Night Hello I Love you Soul Kitchen Crystal Ship Indian Summer L.A. Woman Light my Fire You make me Real

I can only fit 10 songs on my album, which would be called Ship of Fools: Side One Break on ThroughLove Her MadlyPeople Are StrangeThe Unknown SoldierThe EndSide Two Roadhouse BluesAlabama SongFive to OneShip of FoolsWhen the Music’s Over
5 to 1 Peace Frog Unknown Soldier The End When the Music’s Over People are Strange Cars Hiss By My Window
“THE DARK SIDE” Funny you ask, in high school we had a band themed after The Doors and we called it “THE DARK SIDE”
